attributes.action: Impose a 'stop' on all county/local councils employing and deploying 'smoke police' to enforce the upcoming smoking ban in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The training and deployment of 'smoking police' in England is another huge errosion of the freedoms of the English way of life.  The phenomenal waste of up to £30 million to merely train these people is abhorrent.    
This waste of public money could be better spent on hospitals education and the care of our elderly.  

If you feel strongly regarding yet another errosion of your freedoms and feel evermore persecuted under this government please sign and make your feelings known.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SMOKINGSPIES/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
